meta.title: GajiDev - Indonesia Developer Salary Calculator
meta.description: Check developer salaries in Indonesia by role, experience, and location. Data from NodeFlair, Glassdoor, and community.

hero.title: How Much Do Developers Earn in Indonesia?
hero.subtitle: Check salary estimates based on your role, experience, and location.

result.title: Salary Estimate
result.noData: No data available for selected filters
result.tryAdjusting: Try adjusting filters to see results
result.noDataTitle: Select filters to see salary estimates
result.noDataSubtitle: Use the filters above to see salary ranges by role, experience, and location. Or help us by adding your salary data!

submit.title: Share Your Salary
submit.subtitle: Help other developers by sharing your salary data anonymously.
submit.success: Thank you! Your data has been submitted anonymously.
submit.successSubtitle: Thank you for contributing! Your data will help other developers get more accurate salary information.
submit.error: An error occurred. Please try again.
submit.anonymous: Data is submitted anonymously. We do not collect personal information.

footer.sources: Data sources: NodeFlair, Glassdoor, Dicoding, Community
footer.disclaimer: Data is estimated and may differ from actual conditions.

percentile.title: Compare Your Salary
percentile.label: Enter your current salary
percentile.message: Your salary of __salary__ is higher than __percentile__% of __role__s earning __paymentType__.
percentile.recommendation1: You are in the top tier! Consider negotiating for senior roles.
percentile.recommendation2: You are above average. Keep developing your skills!
percentile.recommendation3: There is room for growth. Consider upskilling or job hunting.
